description:
New! XML Bibles!  Install bibles on your device for offline use from a repository of bibles at churchsw.org.  Multiple languages.  Multiple Bibles. Blazing fast.

 Reminder: New theme available in preferences.

Copy to clipboard.  On device KJV with Strong's lexicon definitions!    More Bible versions in many different languages!  Touch navigation with preferences.

On-the-Go Bible Study uses Logos Bible Software and biblia.com and is designed to help you study the Bible in multiple ways.  However, you don't need a Logos or biblia.com account to use the software.  If you do get an account you get access to more commentaries and other resources.

Search
Passage Guides
Journal
Reading Plans
Bible Studies
Strong's Lexicon 
Bookmarks

You can also communicate easily:
email, text

You can also set up a library of your thoughts.  Easily save and retrieve journals of past passages.   Set preferences on what functions you want to use.

*requires Wifi for biblical text other than KJV/ESV and to install XML bibles - caches content you read for offline retrieval later, however

1.5.0 on device ESV, better navigation, better notification handling
1.6.0  wider commentary pane
1.6.5  bookmarks
1.6.6 workaround for webOS bug
1.7.0  fixed install problems. New theme added (see preferences).   RVR60 added.
1.8.0  XML Bibles

If you're having trouble because with reinstallation issues, go to the biblia.com logo, tap it and then tap "Reinstall KJV."  This should solve any problems.  Please contact support if it doesn't.
versionNote:
Major Bug fix: Now you can actually install a new xml bible.

New!  Sync notes with toodledo.com.   This is in beta form.  Please let me know if there are bugs.  But it will sync your items with toodledo.com and allow you to preserve your data 'in the cloud.'  This is in preparation for switching to Enyo2.
